section.name: Release Description 5.0.0a
section.p: This release of the Ingest Program Set is a component of the integrated release (5.0.0a) of the HORIZON System. This release is intended as an operational release.

Building on capabilities delivered in the last release, this release focuses on improving the overall reliability of the Ingest System. Details on this release can be found in the following sections of this document:

section.name: Capabilities
section.p: This section details the new, modified and corrected capabilities that comprise this release of the Ingest Program Set. In lieu of listing the capabilities by requirement they have been summarized. For a complete list of the requirements and their support status, see Appendix A.

ul.li: ingest client now supports local data repository created by data handlers for SIP submission and monitoring.
Updated to support new SIP message protocol

section.name: Installation
section.p: This section details the procedures for installing and configuring the software in this program set.

subsection.name: Ingest-Server Installation
subsection.p: The Ingest Server module consists of the core implementation for the program set (everything happens here). The installation of this module is covered in the Ingest Server Installation document.

subsection.name: Ingest-Client Installation
subsection.p: The Ingest Client module consists of command-line applications for interfacing with the Manager Web Service. The installation of this module is covered in the Ingest Client Installation document.

section.name: Operation
section.p: This section details any necessary setup and the commands for running the software in this program set.

subsection.name: Ingest-Server Operation
subsection.p: The operation of this module is covered in the Ingest Server Operation document.

subsection.name: Ingest-Client Operation
subsection.p: The operation of this module is covered in the Ingest Client Operation document.
